Description.Name: Main Gauche LST
Description.Details: The Main Gauche Light Support Tank is a fire support companion to Brooks Incorporated's Galleon. Though slower, topping out at only 64 km/h, five tons of armor protect it. The Main Gauche was actually submitted to the Free Worlds League Military because that organization was looking for a tank with long range capability. It finally reached full production in 3064. This variant introduced in 3066 removes the Machine Guns to add a C3 Slave Unit and an ER Small Laser. While this lessens short-range damage potential, it makes the Light Gauss Rifle much more accurate if another unit in its C3 network is close to the Main Gauche's target. This makes it even more advantageous for the light tank to stay at extreme range. Fusion: Expensive engine that works in a Vacuum. Movement: 4/6 Hex: 120/180 Meters. Armor: Armor Structure: Structure Values A S Front 145 15 Left 95 15 Right 95 15 Rear 65 15 Total 400 60 Quirk: Quick Off The Line

YangsThoughts: The Main Gauche provides some powerful long-range firepower in a very light package, a true left hand to light armored forces.
